      • getCompletedTime

        public int getCompletedTime(int idper,
                   int mOrderId,
                   java.util.Date start,
                   java.util.Date end)
        Gets the time length of the sessions already performed by the member m, corresponding to the module order mo. A session is seen as completed if it was scheduled, even though it has not actually occurred.
        Parameters:
        idper - member's id
        mOrderId - id of the module order corresponding to the training performed
        start - start date
        end - end date
        Returns:
        a length in minutes
